title: La Bauhinia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Inside the upscale Hotel Shangri-La, this restaurant offers veggie options for lunch and dinner and also a vegan afternoon tea with a variety of fine vegan pastries offered daily from 3:30-5:30pm. Be warned that the regular food menu includes foie gras.
